name: SliverFloatingHeader
desc: A sliver that shows its [child] when the user scrolls forward and hides it when the user scrolls backwards.

fields.name: animationStyle
fields.desc: Non null properties override the default durations (300ms) and curves (Curves.easeInOut) for subsequent header animations.

fields.name: snapMode
fields.desc: Specifies how a partially visible [SliverFloatingHeader] animates into a view when a user scroll gesture ends.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget contained by this sliver.
